languages.text: "Нечестивица Теодора, ложная правительница, сорок лет назад пополнила экипаж на торговой базе "Обод Эриоха". Она издавна была оплотом чистых. Я и мои собратья были избраны, чтобы взойти на борт ее судна и привести нас к Многорукому Императору. Много лет мы готовили бунт против вашей безбожной власти..."

"Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."
languages.original_text: "Нечестивица Теодора, ложная правительница, сорок лет назад пополнила экипаж на торговой базе "Обод Эриоха". Она издавна была оплотом чистых. Я и мои собратья были избраны, чтобы взойти на борт ее судна и привести нас к Многорукому Императору. Много лет мы готовили бунт против вашей безбожной власти..."

The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Emperor-in-the-Void. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

languages.text: « Il y a quarante ans, la profanatrice et fausse souveraine Théodora a fait une escale à l'avant-poste commercial de la Faille d'Heriokh pour compléter son équipage. L'avant-poste servait depuis bien longtemps de bastion pour les purs. Mes frères et moi avons été choisis pour embarquer à bord de son vaisseau et le préparer à la venue de l'Empereur aux mille bras. Cela fait des années que nous préparons ce soulèvement contre votre domination impie... »
languages.original_text: "Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a quarante ans, la profanatrice et fausse souveraine Théodora a fait une escale à l'avant-poste commercial de la Faille d'Heriokh pour compléter son équipage. L'avant-poste servait depuis bien longtemps de bastion pour les purs. Mes frères et moi avons été choisis pour embarquer à bord de son vaisseau et le préparer à la venue de l'Empereur aux mille bras. Cela fait des années que nous préparons ce soulèvement contre votre domination impie... »

languages.text: «Hace cuarenta años, la profanadora Theodora, la falsa soberana, se detuvo en el puesto comercial Borde de Heriokh para reponer tripulación. El puesto era un bastión de los puros desde hacía largo tiempo. Mis hermanos y yo fuimos elegidos para subir a bordo de su nave y prepararla para la llegada del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos. Llevamos muchos años planeando esta rebelión contra tu dominio impío...».
languages.original_text: "Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

traits.locale_text: «Hace cuarenta años, la profanadora Theodora, la falsa soberana, se detuvo en el puesto comercial Borde de Heriokh para reponer tripulación. El puesto era un bastión de los puros desde hacía largo tiempo. Mis hermanos y yo fuimos elegidos para subir a bordo de su nave y prepararla para la llegada del Emperador de Múltiples Brazos. Llevamos muchos años planeando esta rebelión contra tu dominio impío...».

languages.text: “四十年前，那个叫西奥多拉的亵渎者，那个冒牌的领袖，在赫里奥卡之环贸易哨站停泊，补充船员。那座哨站一直以来都是纯洁的要塞，我和我的兄弟们被选中，登上了她的船，准备迎接四臂神皇的到来。我们花了许多年时间酝酿这场起义，反抗你们这些不信奉神明的统治者……”
languages.original_text: "Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

traits.locale_text: “四十年前，那个叫西奥多拉的亵渎者，那个冒牌的领袖，在赫里奥卡之环贸易哨站停泊，补充船员。那座哨站一直以来都是纯洁的要塞，我和我的兄弟们被选中，登上了她的船，准备迎接四臂神皇的到来。我们花了许多年时间酝酿这场起义，反抗你们这些不信奉神明的统治者……”

languages.text: 「40年前、冒涜者シオドーラは、乗組員を補充するために貿易前哨地ヘリオクのリムに立ち寄った。ここは長い間、純粋な人の掩蔽壕として機能していた。私の兄弟たちと私は、彼女の船に乗り込み、千手皇帝の来訪に備えるために選ばれた。この神なき支配に対する蜂起は、何年も前から行われていた…」
languages.original_text: "Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

traits.locale_text: 「40年前、冒涜者シオドーラは、乗組員を補充するために貿易前哨地ヘリオクのリムに立ち寄った。ここは長い間、純粋な人の掩蔽壕として機能していた。私の兄弟たちと私は、彼女の船に乗り込み、ヴォイドの皇帝の来訪に備えるために選ばれた。この神なき支配に対する蜂起は、何年も前から行われていた…」

languages.text: "Vor vierzig Jahren hat die Ketzerin Theodora, die falsche Herrscherin, Halt an dem Handelsposten Heriokhs Ring gemacht, um ihre Crew wieder aufzufüllen. Der Außenposten hatte zuvor lange Zeit als Bastion der Reinen gedient. Meine Brüder und ich wurden ausgewählt, auf ihr Schiff zu kommen und es auf das Kommen des vielarmigen Imperators vorzubereiten. Dieser Aufstand gegen Euer gottloses Reich wird seit vielen Jahren vorbereitet ..."
languages.original_text: "Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."

traits.locale_text: "Vor vierzig Jahren hat die Ketzerin Theodora, die falsche Herrscherin, Halt an dem Handelsposten Heriokhs Ring gemacht, um ihre Crew wieder aufzufüllen. Dieser Aufstand gegen Euer gottloses Reich wird seit vielen Jahren vorbereitet ..."

languages.text: "Kâfir ve sahte hükümdar Theodora, kırk yıl önce Heriokh'un Ağzı'nda mürettebatını tazelemek için durmuştu. Bu karakol, saf olanlar için uzun zaman boyunca bir sığınak vazifesi görmüştür. Kardeşlerim ve ben gemiye girmek ve onu Çok Kollu İmparator'un gelişine hazırlamak üzere seçildik. Senin tanrı tanımaz hükümdarlığına karşı bu başkaldırı, yıllardır hazırlanıyor..."
languages.original_text: "Forty years ago, the profaner Theodora, the false sovereign, stopped at the trade outpost Heriokh's Rim to replenish her crew. The outpost had long served as a bastion of the pure. My brethren and I were chosen to embark on her ship and prepare it for the coming of the Many-Armed Emperor. This uprising against your godless dominion has been many years in the making..."
